document_data.name: Scriveners of Doom
document_data.mainbody: The '''Scriveners of Doom''' were the priesthood of [[Jergal]], the Lord of the End of Everything.<ref name=NEoM-p40-41">
document_data.Role: Priests of Jergal served as scribes, funerary workers, and morticians. The task of recording the fates and affairs of short-lived mortals of the land rested with the Scriveners of Doom.<ref name=NEoM-p40-41"/>
